meta_description: The broadest spectrum of visual culture at the highest level of quality in Boca Raton. We periodically offer free admission opportunities throughout the year. Admission for Members is always free.

accessibility_text:
## Admission

Members: FREE  
Adults: $16.00  
Seniors (ages 65+): $12.00  
Groups: $10.00  
High School Students (under 18): FREE  
Children (under 15): FREE  
  
[Buy Tickets __](https://experience.bocamuseum.org/events/8dd7f6ef-dc6c-663b-01e2-4f1fc2fd1c0d)  

## Museum Hours

Wed, Fri, Sat, Sun: 10:00 am - 5:00 pm

Thu: 10:00 am - 8:00 pm

Mon, Tue: Closed 

Body

Everyone is welcome.

We offer a variety of support services to make the Boca Raton Museum of Art accessible to all; to assist with your visit. For additional information, questions, or accommodations not mentioned below, please contact us at [561-392-2500](tel:561-392-2500) or use our [contact form](/contact).

## ADA Accessible Entrance

An ADA accessible doorway is located to the right of our main lobby doors. The Visitor Experience staff is ready to assist visitors entering the Museum as needed.

## Elevator

An elevator is available to take you between floors, within the museum. It is located at the end of the Grand Hall, across from the stairs.

## Parking

Handicapped parking is available at no charge with valid handicapped placard in specially designated spaces located along the plaza and parking garages within Mizner Park. Handicap placard must be visibly displayed within your vehicle.

## Restrooms

Wheelchair accessible restrooms are located on both levels of the Museum. Single-user, all gender restrooms are located on the first floor next to the Wolgin Education Center and the Museum Store.

The Cultural Heart of Boca Raton

Body

The Boca Raton Museum of Art encompasses a creative campus that includes the [Museum](/visit) in Mizner Park and the [Art School](/art-school). The Museum has provided seven decades of cultural and artistic service to the community and to many visitors from around the world.
